options.content: <mark>TIPS</mark>: The Ingress-controller setting "spec.hostNetwork=true" is not supported.

targets.sql: SELECT Percentile(`rrt`,0.9) AS `delay_p90`, time(time, 60) AS `time_60`, node_type(pod_group_0) AS `client_node_type`, icon_id(pod_group_0) AS `client_icon_id`, pod_group_id_0, pod_group_0 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE `pod_group_0` = 'istio-ingressgateway' AND `pod_cluster_0` = 'k8s-d-rUL3jSx3ft' AND time>=1710855337 AND time<=1710856237 GROUP BY `time_60`, pod_group_0, pod_group_id_0, `client_node_type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

SELECT Percentile(`rrt`,0.95) AS `delay_p95`, time(time, 60) AS `time_60`, node_type(pod_group_0) AS `client_node_type`, icon_id(pod_group_0) AS `client_icon_id`, pod_group_id_0, pod_group_0 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE `pod_cluster_0` = 'k8s-d-rUL3jSx3ft' AND `pod_group_0` = 'istio-ingressgateway' AND time>=1710855337 AND time<=1710856237 GROUP BY `time_60`, pod_group_0, pod_group_id_0, `client_node_type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

SELECT Percentile(`rrt`,0.99) AS `delay_p99`, time(time, 60) AS `time_60`, node_type(pod_group_0) AS `client_node_type`, icon_id(pod_group_0) AS `client_icon_id`, pod_group_id_0, pod_group_0 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE `pod_cluster_0` = 'k8s-d-rUL3jSx3ft' AND `pod_group_0` = 'istio-ingressgateway' AND time>=1710855337 AND time<=1710856237 GROUP BY `time_60`, pod_group_0, pod_group_id_0, `client_node_type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

list.definition: {"sql":"SELECT pod_cluster as `value`, pod_cluster as `display_name` FROM `vtap_flow_port.1m` WHERE `display_name` != '' AND time >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND time <= ${__to:date:seconds} GROUP BY `value` LIMIT 999999999999","useAny":true,"useDisabled":false}
list.name: cluster

query.sql: SELECT pod_cluster as `value`, pod_cluster as `display_name` FROM `vtap_flow_port.1m` WHERE `display_name` != '' AND time >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND time <= ${__to:date:seconds} GROUP BY `value` LIMIT 999999999999

list.definition: {"database":"flow_metrics","sql":"SELECT pod_group AS value , pod_group AS display_name FROM `vtap_app_port.1m` WHERE pod_cluster IN (${cluster:singlequote})  AND pod_group LIKE '$ingress_wildcard'  GROUP BY `value`"}
list.name: ingress_workload

query.sql: SELECT pod_group AS value , pod_group AS display_name FROM `vtap_app_port.1m` WHERE pod_cluster IN (${cluster:singlequote})  AND pod_group LIKE '$ingress_wildcard'  GROUP BY `value`
